article.title: Kalman and Company to Provide Analytical Support to Joint Program Executive Office for Chemical and Biological Defense Systems
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Kalman & Company Incorporated is receiving $14.1 million for a task order to provide business and analytical support to the Joint Program Executive Office for chemical and biological defense systems. Objectives include risk analyses supporting enterprise-wide efforts and current programs of record, leading to concise business case analyses that identify cost and performance projections, schedule impacts and sustainment/life cycle considerations. The Marine Corps System Command, Quantico, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
